attributes.name: width
attributes.label: Width
attributes.description: Set the width of the component

attributes.name: height
attributes.label: Height
attributes.description: Set the height of the component

attributes.name: color-1
attributes.label: Primary Color
attributes.description: The color of the button.

attributes.name: color-2
attributes.label: Secondary Color
attributes.description: The color of the mouseover.

attributes.name: font-size
attributes.label: Font Size
attributes.description: Set a font size other than the default (20)

attributes.name: min-font-size
attributes.label: Min Font Size
attributes.description: Set a min font size

attributes.name: max-width
attributes.label: Max Width
attributes.description: Set the max width that the component can stretch to

attributes.name: multi-line-height
attributes.label: Multi Line Height
attributes.description: Line-height CSS value to apply when CTA using multiple lines

attributes.name: no-multiline
attributes.label: No Multiline
attributes.description: Prevents any multiline rendering routines.

attributes.name: arrow
attributes.label: Arrow
attributes.description: Set true to enable the arrow.

attributes.name: border-size
attributes.label: Border Size
attributes.description: Sets size of the border in px. Leaving this value blank will remove the border on the CTA.

attributes.name: background-image
attributes.label: Bg Image
attributes.description: Set a background image.

attributes.name: background-image-hover
attributes.label: Bg Image Hover
attributes.description: Set a background image for rollover state.

attributes.name: stretch-origin
attributes.label: Stretch Origin
attributes.description: Similar to the transform-origin CSS property, this defines the point from which the CTA stretches

attributes.name: rtl
attributes.label: Right-to-left text
attributes.description: Right-to-left text.

attributes.name: copy-x-fix
attributes.label: Copy X Fix
attributes.description: Horizontal nudge to adjust copy within CTA, in terms of px

attributes.name: copy-y-fix
attributes.label: Copy Y Fix
attributes.description: Vertical nudge to adjust copy within CTA, in terms of px

attributes.name: arrow-x-fix
attributes.label: Arrow X Fix
attributes.description: Horizontal nudge to adjust arrow within CTA, in terms of px

attributes.name: arrow-y-fix
attributes.label: Arrow Y Fix
attributes.description: Vertical nudge to adjust arrow within CTA, in terms of px

attributes.name: horizontal-pad
attributes.label: Horizontal Pad
attributes.description: Defines the copy's horizontal padding. Use either a percentage string (such as "4%") or a number for px

attributes.name: vertical-pad
attributes.label: Vertical Pad
attributes.description: Defines the copy's vertical padding. Use either a percentage string (such as "4%") or a number for px

attributes.name: y-fix-on-multiline
attributes.label: Y Fix on Multiline?
attributes.description: Determines whether to apply copy-y-fix to copy on multiple lines

attributes.name: data-dynamic-key
attributes.label: Dynamic Key
attributes.description: Monet dynamic data binding.

methods.name: text
methods.label: Set text
methods.description: Set the text of the CTA

methods.name: populateData
methods.label: Populate Data
methods.description: Updates internal data object with any changed attributes
